scripts.build-javadoc: mkdir -p public/drivers && rm -rf public/drivers/java && cd ../ && ./gradlew dokkaJavadocCollector && cp -r ./build/docs/dokka/javadoc docs/public/drivers/java
scripts.build-kdoc: mkdir -p public/drivers && rm -rf public/drivers/kotlin && cd ../ && ./gradlew dokkaHtmlMultiModule && cp -r ./build/dokka/htmlMultiModule docs/public/drivers/kotlin
scripts.build-clj-docs: mkdir -p public/drivers && rm -rf public/drivers/clojure && cd ../ && ./gradlew build-codox
